EntryName	CAH1_HUMAN
ProteinName	Carbonic anhydrase 1 (EC 4.2.1.1) (Carbonate dehydratase I) (Carbonic anhydrase B) (CAB) (Carbonic anhydrase I) (CA-I) (Cyanamide hydratase CA1) (EC 4.2.1.69)
GeneName	CA1
Length	261
Function	Catalyzes the reversible hydration of carbon dioxide (PubMed:10550681, PubMed:16506782, PubMed:16686544, PubMed:16807956, PubMed:17127057, PubMed:17314045, PubMed:17407288, PubMed:18618712, PubMed:19186056, PubMed:19206230). Can hydrate cyanamide to urea (PubMed:10550681).
Subcellular Location	Cytoplasm
